_assets.title: Class 2 medicines recall (action within 48 hours): Buccolam Oromucosal Solution manufactured by ViroPharma SPRL (EL (14)A/12) (89Kb)

body:
## DRUG ALERT

CLASS 2 MEDICINES RECALL

Action Within 48 Hours

  


Pharmacy, Dispensing Clinic and Wholesale Level Recall  
  
28 July 2014  |   |  EL (14)A/12  |   |  Our ref:  MDR 40-03/14   | 

* * *

Dear Healthcare Professional,

ViroPharma SPRL

Buccolam Oromucosal Solution

(Midazolam Hydrochloride)

EU/1/11/709/001, EU/1/11/709/002, EU/1/11/709/003, EU/1/11/709/004

  
  


Dear Healthcare Professional,

ViroPharma SPRL  
  
Buccolam 2.5mg Oromucosal Solution |   |  EU/1/11/709/001  |   
Buccolam 5mg Oromucosal Solution |   |  EU/1/11/709/002  |   
Buccolam 7.5mg Oromucosal Solution |   |  EU/1/11/709/003  |   
Buccolam 10mg Oromucosal Solution |   |  EU/1/11/709/004  |   
(Midazolam Hydrochloride) |   |   | 

 

ViroPharma SPRL is recalling specific batches of Buccolam Oromucosal Solution, listed in the attached appendix, following a routine inspection of the company’s contract manufacturing site in the UK.  The inspection identified the possibility for chemical contamination.  No evidence of contamination has been identified within Buccolam Oromucosal Solution on the market.

Replacement stocks of Buccolam are available.  Pharmacists are asked to quarantine any remaining stocks of the batches listed in the Appendix and return them to the original wholesaler for credit. For stock enquiries please contact UDG Customer Services on 01773 510123 or by email to [Directtopharmacy@udg.co.uk](mailto:Directtopharmacy@udg.co.uk).

For medical information enquires please contact Christopher Rains, ViroPharma SPRL Medical Information on 0800 7312801 or by email to uk.medinfo@viropharma.com.

Recipients of this Drug Alert should bring it to the attention of relevant contacts by copy of this letter. Local area teams are asked to forward this to relevant clinics, general practitioners and community pharmacists for information. 

 

Yours faithfully

Alison Bunce  
Defective Medicines Report Centre  
151 Buckingham Palace Road  
London  
SW1W 9SZ

Telephone +44 (0)20 3080 657  
  


Appendix

Buccolam 2.5mg Oromucosal Solution  
EU/1/11/709/001

Replacement stocks of Buccolam are available.  Pharmacists are asked to quarantine any remaining stocks of the batches listed in the Appendix and return them to the original wholesaler for credit. Recipients of this Drug Alert should bring it to the attention of relevant contacts by copy of this letter. Local area teams are asked to forward this to relevant clinics, general practitioners and community pharmacists for information.

 

Yours faithfully

Alison Bunce
